3. Determine the count: If there are no duplicates, we can conclude that Bethlehem Steel FC belongs to only one league each year. If there is a duplicate, then we will have to determine the number of unique leagues to find out if it belongs to 6 different leagues over the years.

4. Check for exceptions: We should also take note of any special cases where the "league" column is not specified (indicated by "n / a"), as these might affect our conclusion.

```
league_count = {}  # dictionary to store league counts for each team

```
- There are no duplicates, so Bethlehem Steel FC belongs to only one league each year.
